com.shop.cache.api.server
Interface SCServerFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImpSCServerFactory
public interface SCServerFactory

Factory for generating various server objects.

newServer

SCServer newServer(SCServerContext context,
                   SCStorage storage)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Allocate a new server. To start the server, you must dedicate a thread and call SCServer.join()

Parameters:
context - the server context
storage - the storage instance (usually from CCDB2StorageFactory)
Returns:
the server
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - errors
